metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6824 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The sws_init_context function in libswscale/utils.c in FFmpeg before 2.7.2does not initialize certain pixbuf data structures, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via crafted video data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
